script-namespace.name: game
script-namespace.blurb: Contains game state values and functions for managing game state.

method.name: show_message_to

args.arg: The player or team to display the message for, or the value all_players.
An optional sound to play with the message.

method.blurb: Display a message in the kill feed.
method.example: game.show_message_to(team[0], none, "Defend your VIP!") game.show_message_to(team[1], none, "Kill the VIP!")

method.name: end_round
method.example: if game.round_time_limit > 0 and game.round_timer.is_zero() then game.end_round() -- -- That's right: the round timer doesn't automatically end the round. Bungie -- probably set it up that way so that Invasion could use the timer for each -- individual phase. -- end
